description:
Gao and Bal do their best to defeat J Genesis, in hopes of preventing him from selling Origin Breaker to the highest bidder as an instrument of war. Gao, Tasuku, and Gaito`s strong awaken an unknown power within Bal!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gachisugo! Chou Taiyou Ryuu Balle Soleil!!
Ultra-Amazing! Super Sun Dragon, Balle Soleil!
ガチスゴ! 超太陽竜バルソレイユ!!
